description: Governments have invested millions on cycling during the pandemic. Here's what's changed.
title: Coronavirus: How pandemic sparked European cycling revolution
title_page: Coronavirus: How pandemic sparked European cycling revolution - BBC News
maintext: "It's been crazy to see what we thought would happen in the next 10 years suddenly happening in three to six months," says Taco Carlier, whose electric bike brand VanMoof sold more bikes in the first four months of 2020 than it did in the previous two years.
